001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.authentication;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent.SuperUiServiceFluent;
004
005/**
006 * Represents a UI-based authentication client.
007 *
008 * <p>Implementing classes are responsible for handling user login processes within the UI.
009 * This interface defines a method for performing login operations, which may include
010 * caching session details for reuse.
011 *
012 * <p>This interface is commonly implemented by {@link BaseLoginClient}, which provides
013 * session management capabilities, including local storage and cookie persistence.
014 *
015 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
016 */
017public interface LoginClient {
018
019   /**
020    * Logs in a user through a UI interaction.
021    *
022    * @param uiService The UI service used to interact with the login page.
023    * @param username  The username of the user.
024    * @param password  The password of the user.
025    * @param cache     Whether to cache session data for reuse.
026    */
027   void login(SuperUiServiceFluent<?> uiService, String username, String password, boolean cache);
028
029}
